● You can banish 1 card from your hand; draw 1 card.
● You can banish this card from your GY; Send 2 "Apocrypha" cards from your Deck to your GY.

1220411.effect:

1222890.effect: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card and target 1 "Battletech" monster you control; It cannot be destroyed by card effects until the end of this Phase. If this card is banished: You can target 1 "Battletech" monster in your GY and 1 "Battletech" Ritual monster you control; Equip that monster in your GY to that monster you control as a Normal Trap. You can only use each effect of "Battletech Heta" once per turn.

1222879.effect: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card and target 1 "Battletech" monster you control; Until the end of this Phase, negate the effects of all the opponent's cards that target that monster. When you Ritual Summon a monster, you can banish this card from your Graveyard as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon. If this card is banished: You can target 1 "Battletech" monster in your GY and 1 "Battletech" Ritual monster you control; Equip that monster in your GY to that monster you control as a Normal Trap. You can only use each effect of "Battletech Koppa" once per turn.

1068362.effect:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Battletech" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Battletech Sampi". 1220419.effect:

1582197.effect: This erudite philosopher has grown tired of the endless pursuit of knowledge. Dark ideas threaten his once incredible moral integrity.

1582201.effect: This sweet innocent girl is unaware of the dark forces spinning an intricate web of deceit around her, preparing to lure her into a life she wants nothing to do with.
1582201.name: Gretchen, Faust's Grace

1637392.effect: Mephisto vowed to make Gretchen almighty. Having been blinded by greed and Dr. Faust's teachings, she vehemently agreed. Thus, she had begun to lose control... Over her actions, her thoughts, her words... all she could understand anymore was "Mephisto".
1637392.name: Mephisto Manifested, Ms. Faust
1637392.pendulum_effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Faust" Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can discard 1 "Faust" Normal Monster; send 1 "Mephisto" Trap from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Mephisto Manifested, Ms. Faust" once per turn, also you cannot Special Summon Effect Monsters the turn you activate either of these effects.

1582195.effect: Target 1 Spell/Trap on either field; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal Monster from your GY.

1582209.effect: Take 1 "Faust" Normal Monster from your Deck or GY, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it, then you can draw 1 card. Despite his fierce loyalty to his country and its people, he grows concerned about his friend's changing demeanor upon assuming the throne...
